titles.title: Middle Class Mortgage Insurance Premium Act of 2022
Middle Class Mortgage Insurance Premium Act of 2022
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the income cap with respect to the mortgage insurance premium deduction, and to make such deduction permanent.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Middle Class Mortgage Insurance Premium Act of 2022
This bill increases the adjusted gross income threshold for the phaseout of the mortgage insurance premium tax deduction and makes such deduction permanent.
